sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { foods:string[]=[]; constructor(private fs:FoodService){} //retrieve image data using service ngOnInit(): void { this.foods=this.fs.getAll(); //all image come in foods } }
